author: Howard Risher
text: I have been asked by the federal Office of the Director of National Intelligence to identify government agencies that have group or team incentive plans.  The intelligence agencies have been criticized for a lack of collaboration.  A recent report by NAPA recommended the adoption of group incentive plans to address the problem.  My question involves the plan design details and its impact on agency management.
title: Group/Team Incentive Plans
